mapper.select: select o.operator_id, o.operator_name, o.dept_id, o.chinese_id, o.`role`, o.sex, o.phone, o.avatar, o.status, o.email, o.create_time, d.dept_name from operator_info as o,dept_info as d where o.dept_id=d.dept_id and o.operator_id = #{operatorId}

select o.operator_id, o.operator_name, o.dept_id, o.chinese_id, o.`role`, o.sex, o.phone, o.avatar, o.status, o.email, o.create_time, d.dept_name from operator_info as o,dept_info as d where o.dept_id=d.dept_id and o.`role` != '0' and o.operator_id = #{operatorId} and o.operator_name like concat('%', #{operatorName},'%')
and o.dept_id = #{deptId} and o.chinese_id = #{chineseId} and o.`role` = #{role} and o.phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%') and o.o.sex = #{sex} and o.`status` = #{status}
AND date_format(o.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(o.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
